resources.string:
You can calculate your BMI using this app. I recommend this app only for adults age starting from 20 years. 


You can enter your weight and height. You have to select what measurement type you are using. 
			kg = kilograms
			lb = pounds
			cm = centimeters
			ft = feets 


After entering your data you can have result by pressing CalculateBMI button. In result you will see your BMI value, your health status and the weight you have to maintain according to your height. 


Then you can see BMI chart classified by World Health Organization(W.H.O). 


Finally you can get idea about your health and your nutrition level. 



For more details : sunerasu2216@gmail.com 




Enjoy App. 
Thank You!

BMI (Body Mass Index) is important as it is widely regarded that your chances of having a longer and healthier life are improved if you have a healthy BMI. 

If your BMI is high, you may also have an increased risk of developing type 2 diabetes, as well as other metabolic diseases such as hypertension, high cholesterol and heart disease. 


BMI helps determine someone's overall health risk and what treatment may be appropriate. 


If your BMI is low, it means you are underweight. If high, it means you are overweight or obese. 


Some risks of underweight 
		Osteoporosis 
		Anemia 
		Slow or impaired growth 
		Feeling tired all the time 
		Getting sick frequently 

Some risks of overweight 
		High blood pressure 
		Heart disease 
		Type 2 diabetes 
		Osteoarthritis 
		High cholesterol and blood lipids(LDL) 


To know more, visit : Why Use BMI
